name: Evil Heart Fever
description:
This game is an intense bullet hell roguelike shooter, evolve and destroy the celestial army to try to open the hell's gate.
Items, references and transformations based in : Lovecraftian universe, biblical sins, and all types of angels and celestial creatures.



EVIL HEART FEVER is an evil entity created every 100 years. Whenever he appears, the celestial forces begin to fight, because if he is not stopped, he can open the hell's gate and bring much destruction to the human plane.
It is created by the selfish energy of human beings, the more humanity does not care for others and has no love for the lives of others, the more powerful is the EVIL HEART FEVER.


  • Intense action Roguelike.
  • Discover transformations.
  • Evolve in different ways.
  • Meet all types of angels.
  • An interesting and fun Bullet Hell.
  • A new heuristic for a casual roguelike.
